programme.title: Watergate - 25 years on
programme.short_synopsis: The Watergate scandal and the eventual resignation of President Richard Nixon.
programme.medium_synopsis: A look back at the break-in at the Watergate office complex in 1972, the details of the FBI investigation in to the incident and the eventual resignation of Richard Nixon in 1974.
